Amazing. Mandala studio is amazing. We went to yoga, had massages and a facial here. The place is clean, looks great and the staff are extremely friendly. They went out of their way to arrange an extra yoga class for us and could accommodate our group of 4. This is the best establishment in Thamel for yoga and spa services. I can not recommend this place enough.

Great Yoga, Massage and Facials. Came here prior to trekking to Base Camp for yoga, the instructor was excellent and very encouraging to the beginners in our group. We returned for the Trekkers massage and Glow Facials after our trek and were very impressed with the quality of service and friendly staff. The facilities are excellent and we highly recommend Mandala Studio Yoga & Spa.

A still, clean harbor of kindness, with an incredibly well qualified staff. I love Nepal! I have traveled to this beautiful country almost a dozen of times by now. And each time I sojourn in KTM, for no reason would I miss out on the opportunity to grant a visit to the Mandala Yoga Studio located in Sagarmatha Bazaar (Mandala Street). I have not (yet) used their yoga facilities per se, but have extensively benefited from numerous sessions of massage there. If like me, you like to "pamper" your muscles, joints & even soul after intensive & strenuous physical efforts, then the Mandala Yoga Studio is THE place to recover & deeply relax in Thamel:1) The massage facilities are outstandingly CLEAN (and I have benchmarks, for having visited most of the massage studios in Thamel). They are COZY, with an ELEGANT & NATURAL touch, inviting you purposefully to relaxation & stillness2) The staff is amazingly KIND AND QUALIFIED, being genuinely attentive to bringing the best experience to their customers. I have been very well taken care of during my stays, and can highly recommend in particular 2 incredible women practitioners, Kriti & Sonam. They live their art not just with their "magic fingers" but with their entire mind & soul. They are experienced, qualified, knowledgeable, kind & luminous.Go and pay the Mandala Yoga Studio a visit. It is worth it!
the best massage in kathmandu!!!. must to do after you tracking or just for fun!!i did twice without even tracking :)the best massage in kathmandu!!!! great people and great service ;)

Informative and Relaxing. Never been one for yoga but i went with my friends and enjoyed the classes very much the establishment is both clean and safe, the staff friendly and informative and the instructor was helpful and patient with my less then stellar yoga skills, ill be going back for a message so i am hoping that will be wonderful too!
Great massage. I had a 90 minute shiatsu massage in mandala studio it was really great ever had in my life. Staff was really skilled friendly and clean environment and such a recomendable place.

Best place to be. After all hiking n treking everybody need peace , rest and free
This is the best place i have found in nepal to be .
Awesome feeling , good massage , yoga ,spa and many more
Thanks for ur kind welcom

Amazing experience. Mandala Studio is one of the best place in Kathmandu which is close to my favourite breakfast place OR2K. I had the trekkers massage and again shiatsu massage, it was really professional and realaxing. I would definitely recommend this place to go and have your choice of massages.

Ideal location and professional. Mandala Studio was located in the heart, just above my one of the best coffee place in Thamel. I have a trekkers massage after my one week trekking, it was totally relaxed and re-energetic. The facilities are clean, bright, friendly, very professional and owner was very helpful. Highly recommended anyone for sheer joy relaxation.

Mandala day spa special package. I came for an early morning yoga class and stayed for the day. Package included great Hatha class, yummy breakfast and lunch, high quality treatments including facial, oil massage, body scrub, shirodara and reflexology as well as excellent steam room. Treatment practioner was lovely and owner was very helpful. Highly recommended for anyone needing a self care day.

Mandala Yoga and Spa is a amazing place. Mandala Yoga and Spa is a amazing place to get relaxed in Kathmandu. Me along with my team of expedition took facilities provided by spa centre after the 15 days trek of Everest Base Camp. we took trekker massage and spa in this centre and found so nice and full of reenergize . Yoga Class/Spa/variety of Massage are the facility of this Spa. I personally recommend to take Yoga class of Kriti Mam. I am impressed with the service provided by host Biren and Kriti. Wish you always be in the heart of client as you are n mine.

Professional and ideal location. This is the only yoga class and massage I've received in Nepal, but relative to the quality and professionalism that I experienced in India, Mandala studio shoots them all out of the water. Mandala studio is located just above one of my favorite coffee shops in Thamel in the the middle of town, so there's no going out of your way to get there. Dipendra taught the yoga class and was really passionate about challenging his students and taking his time (he actually gave optional 30 minutes of extra instruction at the end for us to practice various inversions). The massage was lovely (they ask and take into account how much pressure and if you have medical conditions), my masseuse took her time and went above and beyond what I was expecting. The facilities are clean, open, bright, and well decorated.

Friendly and Professional. I attended daily yoga classes here at Mandala Studio for several weeks. I found Kriti to be a fantastic teacher and very helpful. I was challenged to better myself every day and have improved physically very much. I was also very impressed with the spa. I had a blissful massage and actually fell asleep I was so relaxed. The prices were also very reasonable and during the low season were happy to help out a little due to my student status. Thanks for everything guys!
Really nice Environment. Its a really nice atmosphere, good staff and very quiet how though it is in the heart of Kathmandu. Definitely worth a massage!

Excellent massage and sauna bath. This is the place for yoga and spa in ktm .which is located as heart of thamel ktm .i have been many times in the studio for Swidish masasge which is one of the best massage for me and perfect sauna bath.For sure it was the best destination for spa.
Best massage. Been there many times,well managed ,very friendly people, quality services ,which made it best spa of thamel

Great spa n friendly environment at the heart of thamel. Guys if u r seeking a great massage n yoga class then mandala studio yoga n spa is the best.a peace environment net n clean to relax ur mind n body......

Friendly and professional. I have been attending yoga classes almost everyday and they have made such a huge difference and positive impact on my health and strength. Kriti is highly professional and well studied. I love the proper relaxation and guided meditation at the end of the class. I also had a proper massage from one of the therapists today and felt so good afterwards I decide to write this review. Thank you so much guys! I feel like I'm floating :)

One of the best trekkers massages.. After 16 days of trekking all you want is a damn good massage and Mandala Studio is the only way to go. Great location, great staff, awesome massage, and amazing ambiance.

200 Hours Yoga Teacher's Training. I really wanted to study Yoga and i found this fabulous place that provides Certification to become a Yoga Teacher, but my tourist visa was about to expire and i only had a few days left. I was sad because i found this place at the last minute and thought it would be impossible to attain a Student Visa but i wanted to do this course so badly that i decided to walk in and give it a try since they help you through the Visa process. Well, Birendra from Mandala Yoga & Spa pulled a miracle because my student visa was granted within less than a week. It took just a few days and here i am studying and practicing Yoga and Massage Therapy. They're so nice and courteous.

Best massage I've received & great yoga classes. I stayed in a hotel right next door and came to this studio every day while staying in Kathmandu. I started my day with morning yoga classes and came back for 2 massages. Staff at the reception was extremely kind and friendly. I really enjoyed my yoga classes and my meditation class (first time, so not sure how good this is). I had Jane and Kriti as my yoga instructors and would highly recommend taking their classes (Beginner Yoga, Vinyasa Flow, Hatha Yoga). They make sure that you get your basic poses right. My highlight was my trekkers' massages here by a petite woman masseuse whose name started with S. (I'm sorry!!). If you can track her down, I'd REALLY recommend her. I've received massages from the U.S., Korea, China, Thailand, Poland and I must say this was probably the best I've had. This studio is located conveniently in a charming courtyard near some of the best cafes and restaurants in town like Himalayan Java Cafe, New Orleans Cafe and OR2K. I highly recommend this studio.

Great yoga & massage studio right in the heart of Kathmandu. I visited Mandala Yoga & Spa studio after finishing doing a trek in the Himalayas. We were staying in Kathmandu Resort Hotel just around the corner which is also a lovely place. I did yoga here on Thursday afternoon with Jane and had an amazing massage afterwards, after trekking for 12 days this was well deserved. I liked the place so much I booked in for another yoga session on Friday morning with Kriti and she is a great teacher, well able to read your abilities and alter the class to suit you while also giving various options to more intense poses. I will definitely go back there the next time I'm in Kathmandu.

Fantastic place with wonderful owners and staff. I had 3 reiki sessions at Mandala spa and would recommend to everyone. It was my first time having reiki treatments and it did me really good. The owners and staff are friendly and professional. Really nice people. I wish my stay in Kathmandu was longer because I would have booked more treatments. I will definitely come back next time I'm in Kathmandu, and I wish the much success.

Fantastic Yoga Studio and Spa in Central Thamel, Kathmandu . I found Mandala Studio and Spa on TripAdvisor after searching for yoga and massage instruction in Thamel, Kathmandu. I took an average from numerous reviews and decided to book ten days of (unlimited) yoga classes and 20 hours of Shiatsu massage instruction. I was a complete beginner in both areas. The cost was very reasonable (under £200 for both ) and I have thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The staff are friendly, professional and welcoming. During my instruction I have made friends of all ages and from all corners of the world. It is a clean, social and peaceful environment and the tuition (in English), is precise and easy to follow. Allowance is made for all levels of ability. I can thoroughly recommend the beauty treatments, massage sessions and healing sessions offered and experienced a Singing Bowl Healing Session for the first time....truly a relaxing experience and one not to be missed! As a lone female in Kathmandu, I felt safe and secure at all times. Generally, a professional, well-run studio and spa to be thoroughly recommended. I will certainly be returning.

Absolute heaven for the body!. I had a 90min massage and it gradually became one of the most magnificent experiences I have had. Definitely the best massage I have ever had. Perfect balance of gentle and firm. Don't miss out, it's incredible.The morning yoga classes I did were also superb. Such a beautiful session.This place is wonderful!

Fantastic massage and great yoga. I received 2 massages and went to 2 yoga classes. The first massage was the best I've ever had, and the second one was a different masseuse, who being small and thin was able to stand on my back and use her feet. A truly remarkable massage experience. The yoga teachers are well trained and experienced. English is not their first language, but they stop what they are doing and show what they want you to do. I've taken yoga classes in several countries, and each has its own style, as does Nepal. At first it may seem different, but it is easy to get used to. Try it.
Great yoga experience. Had a few days in Kathmandu, and dropped in for a yoga-class. I had a really good teacher, who was really good at advising. Overall, very recommendable.

Amazing Healing Experience. I attended a 90 min Hathaway Yoga class and a 45 min Sound Healing session. The Yoga teacher gave excellent cues and addressed the entire body/mind/spirit. During the ending meditation I had zero thoughts I was so well prepared after the postures. The Singing Bowl session exceeded my expectations. The teacher was authentic, soulFULL, and proficient at his craft. I highly recommend this studio. Received free hot green tea afterward by request. Western Toilet. I would return here again and again.

Unprofessional and disappointing. Worst yoga class I have ever taken. Teacher turned up 20mins late with no apology. The company didn't have any change for rs.1000 (class cost rs.700). I was the only person there and the teacher didn't adapt to my capable ability. The whole class was spent stretching. No flows or actual yoga. Another person turned up late because times on the website were wrong. Lots of time spent laying in different positions and teacher kept leaving the studio while we were left doing nothing. Class finished on time even though it was late starting and teacher left the building before we had even put mats away. Both the other girl and I explained our awful experience to the receptionist who accepted the other girl only pay half (rs.350) but he still didn't have change for me. I explained I would have a coffee downstairs and give him an opportunity to get the refunded money he had agreed to. He did come down to where I was having a coffee but not to give me agreed change but demanded I go back up to the studio where he had called back the yoga teacher. By this point I wanted nothing more to do with the studio and didn't return- loosing my money.Very unprofessional and disappointing!

Best meditation and yoga in Kathmandu. My first time doing meditation. Was excellent. The yoga class was the best I had experienced in Kathmandu. Got a great massage and pedicure too. Affordable and friendly.

Great yoga. Perfect for all levels, in a smaller room for a better experience (more adjustments and attention from the instructor) and many mirrors so you can assess your practice yourself. Definitely worth 700 rupees for walk in class!

Above all the rest!. Been to multiple spas in Thamel- this one was very clean, professional with friendly staff who were so welcoming. It's definitely a cut above the rest!The whole establishment was catered so well for tourists and made you feel very comfortable. A must visit for all travellers, especially after trekking! Thank you Mandala Studio!

Yoga class is great. I took a yoga class today. There was only my friend and I in the class. It's like a private class and it's only 7usd for 45 minutes. The teacher is really a professional and he did his yoga study in an university in India. He tried to let us remember a few tips and few movement to do everyday at home. I booked massage as well. To test tomorrow. The special package for yoga class 90minutes+Swedish massage 1hour+pedicure is only 3500 rubis. Service charge is excluded but you can bargain not to pay the service fee.

Yoga. Taken a couple yoga classes here and always leave feeling better than when I came. It's a laid back environment that tends to spawn good conversation afterwards. If you enjoy yoga check this place out.

A must visit!!. I was lucky enough to stumble upon this little gem with a couple of days left in Kathmandu. I had five services over two days and left feeling like a new woman. The services were wonderful and the friendliness of the owner and staff would keep me coming back if I lived there, or visit again. I think my favorite service would have to be the 90 minutes massage. I met friends after and they commented how relaxed I looked. I want to thank everyone at the Mandala Studio Yoga & Spa for making me feel so 'welcome and wanted' in your beautiful Nepal.

INCREDIBLE Reiki Course. I took the first level introduction Reiki course with Kriti and it was one of the most incredible, life-changing experiences; Kriti is a wonderful, kind teacher who told me so much about the philosophy behind yoga and Reiki that I had never known before. I am so grateful to her for sharing her knowledge about yoga and Reiki! I would recommend this course to anyone, even if you know nothing about Reiki; it will really change the way you look at yourself and the world.

Mandala studio , the best :). HI ,, I had such a good massage, perfect place to relax and feel better, that why i have to recommend this place for anybody ,even for the first time .Go learn GO get Massage the shiatsu is really great Go get better in any way :)

Great Nepali message and vinyasa flow yoga. Did a yoga class follows immediately by a 90 minute Nepali massage. Th yoga class was small, only four of us, and the teacher was great. She was friendly and kept things moving quickly but still took time to help us when we didn't understand or weren't doing it right, without making us feel bad or awkward. The massage after was one of the best I've had. I asked for medium pressure and wish it would've been a bit harder, but still was amazingly relaxing. Thought it was a bit expensive after being in Thailand and Southeast Asia, but it's prices were pretty competitive for the Thamel area (still way cheaper than in the USA) and definitely worth it.

Beauty half-day treatment AWESOME!!!!. Strongly recommended. I did 1h30 nepali massage, then body scrubbing, face treatment and sauna. All the staff is really professional, nice and helpful. Go there for yoga classes or massage or beauty treatment is the right present for yourself :)

Simply Amazing. I went for a yoga session, then a second and finally a third before I decided on taking the their Teacher Training Course. I've tried yoga many times back in the U.S., but I never what I've always hoped for out of it. From the first class, I knew I have found my Yoga Home! The staff is very friendly, the studio is beautiful and the location is central. The Mandala Studio strikes an impossible equation of being that oasis of serenity in the middle of the hustle and bustle of Thamel The main teacher/guru, Kriti, is such an amazing talent. She is able to give individual attention without taking away from other students. She always encouraged me to take on challenges that absolutely shocked me when I was able to achieve them. As for the Spa, the facilities are fantastic including a steamroom and sauna while the masseuses are well versed in the different massaging styles, delightful and professional. As I said, I came for a yoga session and stayed to become a yoga teacher - what a life changing experience!

The one place for your wellness of physical, emotion & mental. I’m a regular in yoga so when I had some free time during my travel in Nepal, the thought of joining a yoga session came impromptu. I approached the guest house owner of where I stayed for some recommendations and he introduced me to Mandala Studio. Mr Biren the owner came personally to the guest house to meet me and later took me to the studio for a visit. The first impression was good. It has a decent three-wall mirrored yoga classroom & spa (massage) rooms. I wasn’t too keen on the latter but I returned the same day afternoon for vinyasa flow yoga. All I can say is I love it! The teacher was great, the classroom was clean, the ambience was fantastic, they practised good hygiene and yoga mat was provided. Guess what?! I returned the next morning for another round of Hatha yoga. I had such pleasant experience with Mandala and it’s worth checking out. Location wise it was great too, at Mandala Street a little away from the noise in Thamel.

Renée, RN, BSN, yoga teacher. After trying every yoga studio and many spas in Thamel, I recommend Mandala studio, hands down. The staff is so great that I decided to complete my 200 hour Yoga Teacher Training at Mandala. Not only is it the cheapest World Alliance course I have seen in ANY country ($800 USD), the method of teaching and style is authentic. If you are looking to understand yoga and meditation in a deeper way, more than the "exercise trend" it had become, this is the place. A nice bonus is that free massages and treatments come with the yoga packages! Mandala has become like my home and its staff my Nepali family. I will greatly miss all, and thank them for the life lessons and skills to improve my health and build my yoga business!!!

very recommendable. I went to Kathmandu due to work and since I practice Yoga I decided to take at least one class. It was different from the classes in my country but very nice.The traditional nepalí massage was excellent! If you go to Kathmandú, you can't miss it!!!

Enjoy the challenge in a beautiful surrounding!. I am participating in the teachers training here, and it was a lot of fun! Very easy going, and yet challanging. Gives me a wonderful deeper inside into the science and pratice of Yoga. Kriti, our teacher, emphasizes a wholesome few on Yoga, not only as a workout session. One of the things I really enjoy is, that I can go further and deepening my knowledge and capacities in Yoga, and yet have a everyday life - not like a training in an ashram, which might be pretty different. The studio is in beautiful Mandala Street, center of Thamel. It has a nice roof top, small and pretty studio room with mirrors to check your postures and give yourself a smile. They also offer massages, steam and sauna - I'm going to check that out soon ;)Just pop by for a Yoga drop-in class and see yourself!

After the trek treat!. After completing the 2 week Manaslu trek, I was very fortunate to find Mandala Studio Yoga & Spa and schedule the 2 hour hot oil Authentic ayurvedic massage. Even though the spa was hit by the typical rolling brown out right when I arrived, they were prepared to heat the oil with a bunson burner! worked great. Ended with the power back on and nice steam bath.The masseuse was very good paying attention to all the aches and pains. Highly recomment whether after a trek, long plane ride, or just pamper yourself.

Yoga & Massages @ Mandala, FANTASTIC. I am very happy to have found a new yoga place in Kathmandu, right in the heart of Thamel. The people are great (teachers, therapists, Birendra at the welcome desk) and the place is lovingly made. Classes every day - a great way to start the day in Kathmandu.thank you for all your wonderful offerings at this beautiful Yoga & Spa place!
Excellent Day spa. Great new place run by lovely people. Nice vibe and knowledge off massage/yoga. Give it a go, you won't be dissapointed.

Amazing yoga experience. The staff and yoga teachers at the Mandala studio are very welcoming. Both yoga instructors were excellent and it was obvious that they have a wealth of knowledge. As a yoga teacher myself I wanted a more authentic practice and this is what Mandala offers. There are other yoga studios in the area but none come close to the wonderful teaching and friendly atmosphere I experienced at Mandala. I will always chose to practice there when in Kathmandu.

Before and after. I was introduced to Mandala by a friend who had attended the the yoga class here. After long hours of flights from the west I signed up for Trekkers massage for $25 I had a 90 minute deep tissue massage. After the hike I came back to attend the yoga class and enjoyed all aspects of teaching especially the dedicated time to meditation. Thank you for a great yoga class.

Amazing after trekking. I went here to have a trekking massasje. It was amazing. Very professional lady that massasje me. It was really needed after trekking, and even if you haven't been trekking they have a lot of other types of massasje that can satisfy your needs. Highly recommended!

Must visit place after long walk in Nepal. . I have been going there and get treatment since a few years ago. This is my 12th visit in Nepal.
It is such a place that you want to bring your friends with. Very clean facilities, professional massage, and friendly staffs.
ネパールで歩き疲れた際には必ず立ち寄ります。アーユルヴェーダやヨガの知識のあるスタッフがいるので、体調の相談などにものってくれるとても親切なマッサージ屋さんです。
今回も3週間の滞在で2回目の利用です。気になる箇所をアレンジして時間でやってくれます。
旅行仲間に紹介したくなること間違い無いほど清潔で本格的なオイルマッサージ。ただ、外が少々騒がしいのはタメルなので仕方がないです。本当にリラックスできます。ありがとうございました。
Very good massage. Very good massage, went for the Ayog. The pressure was just right and the lady very nice and friendly. Recommended.

Dont look further, this is the best one!. I've been to 3 other massages in Nepal and this was definitely the best one!Very professional, a really Nice and kind staff and hygenic.I felt really comfortable here and they took their time for me.In the beginning they give you a glass of water if you want and they start when you are ready.de woman who gave the massage was really professional and it felt so good. And the room was on the same level, Really clean and peacefull. At the end of the massage the women cut the nails of my feet and i get a banana smoothie, all for free what a kind service!Thank you roshan pulami
Very enjoyable. Great 90 min massage. After a month of trekking this was a most enjoyable massage. Very relaxing and experienced masseuse. Recommend. Don't forget to tip :)

Amazing. Just had a 3 hour Ananda Path Spa package and it was amazing. Especially the Shirodhara part where warm oil is dripped on the forehead. I fell asleep a few times as this part was at the end of the treatment. Highly recommended

wonderful massage in a peaceful place. We had one of the best massage ever in our 9 months trip through all south east Asia (and we tried many ones!). We both choose the Swedish massage which was far beyond our expectations. The two masseuses were very kind, attentive to the pressure (we felt they adapt their strength depending on the people) and incredibly talented to provide good sensations. Everything was made for us to relax: they put some delightful music, put the light down, the beds are comfortable... All the conditions were reunited for spend a delicious moment. We recommend this place for everyone!

Fantastic massage. I had a 60-minute massage at Ananda and it was really good. The place is clean, quiet and very professional. The masseuse was great and I could feel the stress just leaving my muscles. I would recommend it to anyone in Kathmandu. Well worth it.

Best massage. We did nice massage at ananda.. around 90m because of good reviews on tripadvisor staffs looks well trained , clean and deep cool environment ,free wifi avaiable and nice hot shower..would reccummend highly .
No nonsense Spa. Nice clean comfortable. Professional staff. Value for money. Definitely a must go if u want to unwind after a hectic week.

Unwinding in Kathmandu. After flying for more than a day and before heading out for an 18 day trek, massage seemed like a good idea and discovering this spa was golden. An excellent 90 minute massage. Very clean and professional. Highly recommended and looking forward to returning after my trek. The 90 minute deep tissue was an excellent value.

Amazing Shiatsu Massage by Mina. I went 4 times to this massage place. It's clean, very nice people, and most of all, one of their masseuse - Mina - is just a magician with her fingers. Shiatsu is one of the best massage I've ever had. A minor thing to improve would be the noise from the street in the back room. But still brilliant place to visit !

Totally recommended. 6 friends were there to have a ayurvedic massage our last day in Katmandu and it was explendid..the hands of the employees are amazing! the hospitality and careful to all of us are the reflection of the nepali people one hour of masage, and in the first 1 minute we forgot where we are, and after the hour we felt relaxed 100%if you have the chance to go , please dont hesitate!!!
Massage. Finally a very good massage in Thamel, Kathmandu .Nepal. If you like a good experience go there! El mejor masaje que he recibido en Nepal!!! Lo recomiendo.

Best place to get a massage in Kathmandu!!!. We visited several other massage places in Kathmandu in the Thamel area, but this one was by far the best! The staff was really professional and well trained - they really knew how to do massage, customer service was great (it was the only place we could take a shower after the massage) and the prices are much lower then what other places charge. Thus, totally worth a visit!

Perfect. Had a 60min full body massage here today. Absolutely loved it. Felt comfortable as my boyfriend and I could be in the same room- you can choose whether you want a male or female masseuse. The boss was lovely and sat down with us, recommending massages that would suit us to our needs. Complimentary fresh banana juice at the end to top things off!! Will come back
Great massage. Yesterday i had a great shiatzu massage of 60 minutes. Massage therapist had good sensitive skills. I came out relaxed and reborn. Place is clean, peaceful and serene.

Cheap and awesome - good western style spa but hard to find. $20 for a 90 minute massage from a super sweet and seemingly trained masseuse. It's clean with sauna and shower if you like - a little tough to find but its a perfect reprieve for a westerner looking to spend more than $10 in downtown Thamel. Enjoy!

Friendly and accomadating. Very friendly service. Recommended a 90min massage and gave me a good deal! Not fancy, but simple and clean. The massage was what I needed. Comfortable and the masseurs didn't rush. Great facilities too. Had good shower rooms for after massage with hot shower and lockers for my stuff.Finally, even offered a fresh banana juice drink specially made after my visit. Truly impressed with the services! Recommended

Trek recovery. Did a trek yesterday. 18km in 6 hours so my body was in need of some TLC. Ananda was able to provide it. Had a trekking oriented massage, concentrating on the legs. The massage was excellent. The place is clean. And they have showers with hot water! Which can be a real treat in Nepal.

Clean, safe, non-sketchy. Clean, good (non-sexy), legit massage place in Thamel. Upstairs from a TINY (un-tripadvisor listed) awesome Szechuan restaurant. Eat there after your massage. The girls at Ananda are really nice, the back massage and 5pm massage are great, but the ayurvedic oil massage was not my favorite, too much oil. Ask for Meena, she's awesome. If you stay at Hotel Family Home, you should get a 20% discount....but just tip it to your masseuse, they're lovely.

Very good! . We did full body massage 60 minutes and it was very good!!! They want 2000 ropi but you can bargain for less price. מקום מעולה בקטמנדו לעשות בו מסאג'. הם רצו 2000 רופי לעיסוי של שעה אבל הורדנו ל1000 לאדם לעיסוי של שעה בכל הגוף. ממליצה בחום.
Had great 90 minutes Swedish massage . Had great 90 minutes Swedish massage in a clean room with proper massage table and nice background music. They also have lockers for storing valuables.

Ms. Took a friend that had never experienced an Ayurvedic massage. We were both blown away. The service impeccable and the massage took us both to a place we didn't want to leave. A beautiful experience. I will be returning in 3 weeks for a repeat. Thank you.

Wonderful Swedish massage. Decided to come here after reading all the wonderful reviews on tripadvisor - we were not disappointed. Great value for money, wonderful talented masseuses and very relaxing atmosphere. Not that easy to find - it is the next alleyway down from Ramas Momos, and will be on the left. Definitely worth a visit!!!
Excellent massgage . Very good massage,,I have evere done..Nice staffs,well trained and polite. I will visit next time also.

Best massage i have ever had.. I visited today because i had a lot of stress from travelling so much. I took 90 minutes of ayurvedic massage and now i feel great. So relaxing. Everything was super clean and nice and the staff were so accomodating. I'm never going to get a massage anywhere else while i am in Nepal!
I found the best message in ktm!. Clean and nice environment. Very polite staff and well trained. Good value for money. I m sure gonna go back!
"Ananda" as already mentioned in the name!. Recommendable after a hard day' work. Situated in a quite alley and with friendly smiling staff. Feeling like reborn again.
Great experience . A great massage and the staff made every effort to accommodate all of us to get massages at the Same time, even getting in extra staff.

Best Massage. My husband and I travel a lot through Asia and we love our massages. Ananda would have to be our favourite, which is a pretty big call. As they say you get what you pay for, it couldn't be more true here. Yes, you may pay a bit more here, but try it and you will see just how worth it, it is. We tried others in Thamel and Pokhara and they didn't come close. For us hygiene is important and Ananda has clean linen with each client. The aruyvedic is one of our favourites and it's like they know all your sore spots and work on them. Afterwards we feel totally blissed out and relaxed. The therapists here well trained and extremely professional, we can't praise them enough. Thank you, we'll be back
Not much to say... . Simply perfect Very good whole body massage! Very nice atmosphereI can recommend this place to everyone who wants a time out from the trouble in the city.

😃👍Nice and Good whole body massage. In warm sunny room good massage by Monica and Mena. We enjoyed the atmosphere and the quality of the therapists. Also the sirodhare was very relaxing. Price and quality/service is in balance.We have been there already for 5 times. Thank you.

Excellent massages. We visited this spa three times and almost made it back a fourth time on our recent journeys through Nepal, Tibet and Kathmandu. The massages were very good - we each had the same masseuse each time we went. We have had a lot of massages all over the world and I have to say these girls were good. Strong hands and a good attitude, Would recommend it.

Chilled and Relaxed. My wife and I attended this after a very busy 3 day wedding ceremony.Both my wife and I enjoyed our visit here and found both staff that treated us very good.I would have given 5 stars but found that the massage tables a little uncomfortable as there was no hole where your face is supposed to go. Other than that the quality, price and cleanliness was faultless.

Worth the visit!!. After our trek to the base camp we decided to go to Amanda for a couple of massages … they did not disappoint! I had an Ayurvedic massage and acupuncture which I loved. It was not too hard neither too soft. My husband got a facial, back and shoulder massage which he absolutely loved!The team is great and will not be afraid to go over time. They pretty much added 10 min extra on everything!Highly recommend :)

GREAT!. Absolutely beautiful! I went with my friend after a long 24 hours of traveling from India to Nepal and it was exactly what we needed! Such positive energy filled the spa, the all-natural oils used during the massage smelled so good and left our skin feeling so soft and our massage (Deep tissue) was the perfect balance of relaxing and rough.

One of best massage !!. I found recommendation about this place and decided to check it, the place is very nice with very good atmosphere, I took the two hours massage and it was one of the best massage I had, for sure I will come again.

A step up from the normal Kathmandu "spa" experience... Clean and Professional!. Great experience, Amazing prices and 100 times better than the spa in my hotel!!! Very professional and NO HASSLING for anything that I did not ask for. I had a great 2 hour deep tissue massage for $40 that is unheard of in the states. A little tough to find, but a welcome search rewards the client with a wonderful experience and escape from normal Kathmandu insanity. Would go back again and again and again. I only wish I had found it sooner.

Happy Ananda Frequent Flier :). My hotel recommended this spa for a massage my first week in Nepal. In the end I had 4 massages from Ananda including foot, head/shoulders, deep tissue, and "fusion." Although you can find cheaper massages in Kathmandu, I've had my share of poor quality "budget" massages around the world from inattentive and unskilled "therapists" and felt that this was still a great value for what you get--certainly significantly less than I would pay at home but more enjoyable than most massages I get at home as well! I found the facility to be very inviting and comfortable including a locker for your personal belongings, clean massage rooms, relaxing environment, and incredibly friendly staff. I loved my initial masseuse Mina and booked all subsequent massages with her. I loved Mina's strong confident touch but she also is careful to check in frequently to make sure the pressure is what you want. She is attentive to your comfort and uses a variety of techniques that I found very therapeutic for resetting my body after trekking, long travel, or just because it feels good. :) I would recommend Ananda to anyone looking for a good quality massage in Kathmandu in a comfortable environment. Thanks Mina and Ananda!
Clean and professional. This is a western standard spa, clean with standardized practices. The service providers are friendly and very polite. The atmosphere relaxing. The massage is quite good.

The best massage ever!. After few weeks in Nepal I knew about this place and I decided to visit it. I had an Ayurvedic Massage. It was the best massage I have ever had.The place is really nice and clean ando people working there were so polite, nice and wellmannered.I recommend everybody to try it!
Relaxing time. So lovely people, quite and respectful. The massage was great I took time to come back home...due to soft mind and body...

Amazing massage, wonderful staff. My wife and I came by after reading through all the impressive TripAdvisor reviews. We were elated to discover that all the good reviews were more than justified. The staff were friendly and helpful, the rooms and spaces were warm and welcoming, and the massages were exceptional (best massage I've ever had, great review from my wife as well). The prices were a pleasant surprise as well - just $20 for an hour long massage.The only hiccup we experienced came when we tried to locate the place. Turns out it's a bit deeper into the side street than we had expected. After asking a resident for directions we quickly realized our mistake.When you're ready to unwind, we highly recommend you give this place a shot. We know we'll be coming back at least once more before we return home.

The Best Place I have ever to relax. I was searching for the best place to do massage in Kathmanu. I went few places before going to this place, I personaly found this is the outstanding place for to get relif from rowdy kathmandu street. This brillant spa is one of the best i have done ever in my life. Highly recommend this place.Quality: OutsatandingPeople: Very FriendlyService: OutstandingLocation: Very Good (comparitavely quiet in thamel)Price: Best Price/ compare with service

The best massages in the world!. I have been to Ananda Spa for a back massage twice now, and both times were absolutely amazing! The second time I took my boyfriend for a massage too and he agreed with me... I have had many massages all around the world, but that was by far the best massage I have ever had!!!! I highly recommend the back massage here, you will not be disappointed!

By far the best spa in Thamel, Kathmandu. Ananda Spa is a brilliant place, if you want some peace and relaxation after trekking, or just shopping, this is an oasis of calm and serenity in the middle of the noise and bustle of Thamel. The quality of the accommodation is first class without unnecessary fuss and the range of treatments is wide and varied. Massage is really enjoyable, relaxing both body and mind and all this within a very competitive price range. Everyone at Ananda is friendly and extremely attentive making your time there, however short, enjoyable and rejuvenating. Make time in your schedule in Kathmandu to visit Ananda, it is well worth the effort and will only be the first of the many visits you are likely to make to this little jewel of a spa. Chris

Best Thai massage ever!. I get Thai massages often and the massage here was by far the best. Even better than in Thailand. Some of the yoga stretches applied I have never had done before. I feel amazing.Will definitely come back again.

Fantastic spa. Visited Ananda on my final day in Nepal and had a pedicure and a natural signature massage. Both were excellent and great value for money. I asked for hard pressure and that is exactly what I got and felt so invigorated afterwards. Will definitely return on my next visit to Nepal later in the year.

Good ayurvedic massage experience. Ananda natural therapy gave me a good experience of ayurvedic massage. Chill, relaxing atmosphere, good service. You feel taken care of after a visit! Worth the money!

Great, healing bodywork. After 2 days of trekking, we stopped in for the Trekker's Massage and felt amazing afterwards. The staff were very friendly and professional, and we even went back the following day for another treatment. Highly recommended.

REPEAT EXPERIENCE AND COMMENTS. 3/10/15 marked my first visit of 2015, having spent several wonderful days at this spa in 2014. Nothing has changed; still spotlessly clean, with excellent massage therapists providing a relaxing and calming experience.I am saddened to read a "poor" experience noted by: Noesf, San Francisco, Ca. USAA native ofCalifornia myself, his comments lead me to mention, that I feel it is most necessary for all English speaking travelers to make an extra effort to communicate, as most service employees of ThirdWorld Countries do not speak our language! Maybe he and his companion were just having a "Bad Day" In addition i would like to note that most of of Ananda's employees are young Nepali women who have been rescued from very poor villages living in dire circumstances.BRAVO to the owners of this spa who seek to improve the lives of WOMEN in NEPAL!

serene and perfect hideaway from otherwise chaotic city center.. I found this hidden gem while looking from a place to unwind myself after a long journey. And yes it was best.Tastefully decorated, helpful staff and music. Where else in thamel you can get a massage while sun is shinning on your back.Warm feet soak and gentle strokes.Yes a place to visit!

Hidden gem in the heart of thamel. I went there with my two of friends on cold and wet sunday in fabruary after back from our tibet tour. The treatment is as authentic as it can gat. We came out feeling very relaxed and super fresh. The masseurs were very friendly and we were made to feel at home straight away and we were forget where we went for the three hours we were in the treatment room.

Best massage in thamel. Enjoyed very much with the service I had from this place. It's really clean for nepal standard and staff are very friendly and welcoming. I like it when they offer tea green tea after. Will recommend this place.

Well-run spa... the place to go for massages in the heart of Thamel. Let me start by saying that Thamel is literally packed with places that purport to be "massage centers" and "spas". And many of those places will list prices that are incredibly low and look extremely tempting. When my girlfriend and I settled into our 2 weeks in Thamel, we walked around and visited a lot of those places that looked so attractive online. The truth is that many of those are operations with questionable sanitary practices, run by people who are much more business-person (cut costs to the bare bones, etc) than actually therapy-focused.It was with that background that we felt so lucky when the proprietor of our place (Cafe Mitra... it's a gem!) told us about Ananda. Upon walking in, you can feel that this place is different. All the little touches that really shape the experience (lockers, music, tea, cleanliness, etc) set the stage for what is a really solid massage experience. They offer all different types of massage (Ayurvedic, Swedish, Thai, Shirodhara, etc) and really put an emphasis on meeting their clients where they are. The different masseurs certainly offer different levels of firmness, but all of them are attentive, friendly, and well-trained. (Sidenote: Gita comes highly recommended by both of us for a firm massage)The prices are a bit higher than you'll see online for other fly-by-night companies, but I urge you to think about the reason you're getting a massage in the first place. To relax and take care of your health. This place will help you do that.

So so. Mixed bag. My massage was "passable" but too light and the therapist seemed like she didn't have too much experience.My friend really didn't like his at all and left early.Positives: + Place is clean+ Centrally located+ Quiet + HeatedBut...- Expensive (about as expensive as it gets in Kathmandu)- Therapist quality at the lower end (from two data points at least)

best massage i ever had in thamel. I got recommodation from my hotel this place and i didnot disappoint at all.Its a best massage and even my pain was gone away after i had message from this place.I strongly recommended and i will go there again for sure.

"Relaxing <assage". I visited this place few times and had a message here. It was a great message with just the right amount of pressure.The facility is very clean and the staff are nice and friendly.Will go there again and difinitely recommend Ananda.

may be the best massage and spa in thamel.. This spa was just truly awesome.Visted this place few times for treatment with massage,All the treatment were done very professional.Ananda spa is super clean and staff extraordinarily well trained and polite.Enjoyed very much and surely will go again. Try it once.

Good. My partner and I had each an Ayurvedic massage and a Shirodhara treatment there. They were both very nice and professional. The premises are spacey and very clean also, but what makes it a lovely experience is the staff, both professional and very friendly and nice. 4 stars

Awesome massage!!. We had a great ayrevedic massage and natural facial. A 2 1/2 service $41.00 usd. Roshan and his wife Mina were great! I am a massage therapist. Best massage I have had in a long time!!

An absolute must do!. I've been to the Ananda Natural Therapy and Spa twice now, the first time was a couple of days ago I had an Ayurvedic Massage, today I had a body scrub, fantastic, these girls are brilliant at what they do. IfmI'm ever back in Katmandu I will most definitely be coming back for more of the same!what ever you do dont leave Nepal without popping in and giving yourself a real treat.There is a great selection of treatments to choose from, something for everyonemI'm sure!

Exquisitely beautiful experience. The 90 minute ayurvedic massage should be in your bucket list before you leave this life. Or the next. We had the lovely experience of a steam sauna, followed by the massage at the skilled hands of two masseuses. Although tiny in stature they have fingers of steel, and a thorough musculo skeletal knowledge. At only $25 US, it's an experience not to be missed. Before we leave Kathmandu we'll be going back for a hot stone massage and a few other treats. Highly recommended.

The Greatest spa in Thamel. It was great experience here at Ananda Spa.The staff are really kind and the man who treated me had worked as professional therapist for 14 years.The accommodations are inappropriately good for Thamel's conditions.It was really lucky to have such a great massage for just 2000rs

visit to spa april 25, 2014. As a frequent traveler, I can attest that my total experience at Ananda was one on a par with many of the better spas located throughout the world. The entire staff at the spa is trained in a variety of personal care treatments (see website). My afternoon here gave me a feeling of PURE HEAVEN!! The hour Swedish massage was beyond excellent and the 45 minute facial that followed was equally as good. Whether one has just deplaned in Nepal, returned from a trek or in need of pampering and relaxation this is THE SPA in Kathmandu Valley, with easy access in Thamel. (alley next to Vajra Books) If you do not try this spa you are missing a wonderful experience.Christine C.

Great place for yoga and massage. This spa is relaxing the second you walk in the door. They are friendly and accommodating. The facilities are clean and comfortable, and they even have a sauna and nice showers. I have taken yoga classes and had a massage, and will come back. It feels like a hidden gem of quiet and calm in the middle of all the Thamel craziness.

A relaxing moment in busy Thamel, Kathmandu. I really enjoyed my massage at Ananda Spa. The staff is lovely and friendly. The facilities are very nice and clean. And the massage therapist was fantastic! A perfect place for a relaxing moment!

great facility for yoga and relaxation in Kathmandu!!!. I have attended yoga at Ananda spa and natural therapy center since oct 2013. Highly trained, professional instructors & staff will greet you with a smile and a hot tea in their beautiful, new spa. Prices for a private, personalized yoga program are the same as a group class elsewhere in thamel. After trekking in Annapurna and Everest regions, I got a pkg for sauna, body scrub and massage which was amazing and exactly what I needed after weeks of trekking in the cold! This beautiful, new and clean facility stands out from the rest in Kathmandu!
